panels.description: Number of requests per second made to the daemon by a given origin
panels.title: Requests per Origin / Second

panels.description: Number of 5XX responses returned by the daemon per second
panels.title: 5XX Responses / Second

panels.description: Number of requests per second made to the daemon by endpoint
panels.title: Requests per Endpoint / Second

panels.description: DocIds logged by this node during this time frame
panels.title: DocIds Active

panels.description: Cids logged by this node during this time frame
panels.title: Cids Active

targets.expr: sum_over_time({app="node-internal", job="agent"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | docId != "" | totalUnique != "" | unwrap totalUnique [$__interval])
sum_over_time({app="node-internal", job="agent"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | family != "" | totalUnique != "" | unwrap totalUnique [$__interval])
sum_over_time({app="node-internal", job="agent"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | schema != "" | totalUnique != "" | unwrap totalUnique [$__interval])
sum_over_time({app="node-internal", job="agent"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | controller != "" | totalUnique != "" | unwrap totalUnique [$__interval])

panels.description: Updates (i.e. message "typ" equals 0) in the pubsub topic
panels.title: Updates in PubSub Topic

panels.description: Queries (i.e. message "typ" equals 1 and event is received) in the pubsub topic

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="node", job="ceramic/pubsub"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | message_typ=1 and event="received" [$__interval])) by (job)

panels.title: Queries in PubSub Topic

panels.description: Queries (i.e. message "typ" equals 2 and event is published) in the pubsub topic

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="node", job="ceramic/pubsub"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | message_typ=2 and event="published" [$__interval])) by (job)

panels.title: Responses in PubSub Topic
